browse.no_recommendations: No recommendations yet. Please like more characters to unlock personalized suggestions.

chat.no_messages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat.input_notation_hint: Tip: wrap short character actions in *asterisks*, e.g. *smiles*. Put brief scene or environment notes in parentheses, e.g. (thunder rolls).
chat.input_shortcut_hint: Press Enter to send â€” Shift+Enter for a new line.
chat.tips_1: Say hello or ask a direct question to get things going.
chat.tips_2: Use *asterisks* for quick actions and (parentheses) for scene notes.
chat.tips_3: Switch persona or scene anytime using the selector (or sidebar) to steer tone and setting.
chat.tips_4: Be specific about goals (e.g., "plan a heist", "practice small talk").
chat.tips_5: Like characters/scenes you enjoy to improve recommendations.
chat.welcome_body_cta: Tap the input below to say hello or ask a question.

chat.error_loading_character: Failed to load character. It may have been deleted.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Welcome to Yubandao. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

service_description.title: 2. Service Description
service_description.content: Yubandao is a collaborative storytelling and character interaction platform where users can create characters, scenes, and personas, and share and interact with others. The service includes but is not limited to character chat, content creation, and community features.

user_accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
user_accounts.content: You must create an account to use the service. You agree to:
user_accounts.responsibility1: Provide accurate and complete registration information
user_accounts.responsibility2: Maintain account security and be responsible for all activities under your account
user_accounts.responsibility3: Not use another person's account without authorization

user_content.title: 4. User Content
user_content.content: You are responsible for the content you post to the platform (including characters, scenes, conversations, etc.). You warrant that you will not post:
user_content.prohibited1: Content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, or otherwise objectionable
user_content.prohibited2: Content that infringes on others' intellectual property or privacy rights
user_content.prohibited3: Content containing viruses or other harmful code
user_content.prohibited4: Content that violates any applicable laws or regulations

intellectual_property.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: You retain ownership of the content you create. By posting content on the platform, you grant Yubandao a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display your content for the purpose of providing and improving the service. All other content and features on the platform are owned by Yubandao or its licensors.

prohibited_conduct.title: 6. Prohibited Conduct
prohibited_conduct.item1: Abusing, harassing, or threatening other users
prohibited_conduct.item2: Attempting unauthorized access to systems or other user accounts
prohibited_conduct.item3: Interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of the service
prohibited_conduct.item4: Using automated tools to scrape or collect user data
prohibited_conduct.item5: Impersonating others or misrepresenting your relationship with others

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time, including but not limited to violations of this agreement. You may delete your account at any time through the settings page.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties, express or implied. Yubandao does not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. User-generated content does not represent Yubandao's views.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Yubandao and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data loss, or service interruption.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to users through the platform. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through the settings page or email our support team.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Yubandao collects, uses, and protects your personal information. By using our service, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following types of information:
collection.profile_content: Avatar, bio, and other information you choose to share
collection.content_content: Characters, scenes, personas, conversations, and other user-generated content you create
collection.usage_content: Information about how you interact with the platform, including page visits, clicks, and feature usage

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the collected information to:
usage.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our service
usage.item2: Personalize your experience and provide content recommendations
usage.item3: Communicate with you about your account and service updates
usage.item4: Monitor and analyze usage trends to improve user experience
usage.item5: Protect, investigate, and prevent fraud or illegal activities

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:
sharing.item1: With other users - Your public content (characters, scenes, etc.) is visible to other users
sharing.item2: Service providers - With third-party vendors who help us operate the service (e.g., cloud storage, analytics)
sharing.item3: Legal requirements - When required by law or to protect our rights

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to maintain sessions, remember preferences, and analyze usage. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect certain features.

your_rights.title: 6. Your Rights
your_rights.item1: Access and update your personal information
your_rights.item2: Delete your account and associated data
your_rights.item3: Opt out of certain data collection
your_rights.item4: Request a copy of the information we hold about you

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover we have collected such information, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: 8. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the platform. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the settings page or email our privacy team.

problem_report.title: Report a Problem
problem_report.description_placeholder: Please describe the issue you're experiencing in detail...
problem_report.file_too_large: File is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
problem_report.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Please upload an image file.
problem_report.success_message: Thank you! Your report has been submitted successfully.
problem_report.submission_error: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

update_notification.title: Alpha Test Updates
update_notification.alpha_message: Thank you for participating in our alpha test phase! We're excited to have you here and your feedback is invaluable.
update_notification.feature_1: Enhanced chat experience with improved AI responses
update_notification.feature_2: New character creation tools and customization options
update_notification.feedback_message: Found a bug or have suggestions? Click the flag icon to report issues!

onboarding.step1_description: Here you'll find the most popular characters on the platform. Browse through and see what interests you!
onboarding.step2_description: Click on any character card to view their details or start a conversation immediately. It's that simple!
onboarding.step3_description: Ready to bring your imagination to life? Click here to create your own characters, scenes, or personas.
